SourceText: Time for some fun! ü§∏üèæ Let's play together!
Tell me a bit about your child so I can share the best play ideas for you! üé≤‚ú®
text: Ndixelele kancinci malunga nomntwana wakho ukwenzela ndizokwabelana nawe ngeembono ezilungileyo zokudlala!üé≤‚ú®

SourceText: Tap 'Let‚Äôs Play!' and I‚Äôll share a simple, fun, and free activity you can do together!
text: Cofa 'Masidlale!' kwaye Ndizakwabelana nawe ngemidlalo elula, eyonwabisayo, kwaye emahala esingayenza kunye!

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.
See you next time! You can message {PLAY} whenever you would like another easy and fun play idea.
text: Ndakubona kwixesha elizayo! Ungathumela umyalezo{PLAY} nangeliphina ixesha ungathanda imbono ngomnye umdlalo olula nowonwabisayo.

SourceText: I can do more than just play! üéâ In this chat, you can also get ParentText.
text: Ndingenza nangaphezu kokudlala nje!üéâ Kule ncoko, ungafumana kwane Parent Text.

SourceText: ParentText can help you improve your relationship with your child in just 5 days‚Äîtotally free!
text: IParent Text ingakunceda ukuphuhlisa ubudlwelane bakho kunye nomntwana wakho ngeentsukwana ezi 5-ngokupheleleyo mahala!

SourceText: Want to give it a try?
That's okay. If you change your mind, you can always message {PLAY} if you want another activity or {START} if you want to start the programme.
text: Kulungile oko. Ukuba utshintsha ingqondo, Ungakwazi ukuthumela umyalezo ngalo lonke ixesha {PLAY} ukuba ufuna omnye umdlalo okanye {START} ukuba ufuna ukuqala inkqubo.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Ufake @results.number. Ndicela ufake inani eliphakathi ko 0 kunye 17.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: You entered @results.number. This looks too old. Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Ufake @results.number. Lento ikhangeleka indala kakhulu. Ndicela ufake inani eliphakathi ko 0 kunye 17.
note: Strings like @fields.xxx and @results.yyy should not be translated.

SourceText: Sorry, I don't understand what you mean.  Please enter a number between 0 and 17.
text: Uxolo, Andiqondi ukuba uthetha ukuthini. Nceda ubhale inani eliphakathi ko 0 kunye 17.

SourceText: What language works best for you?
text: Loluphi ulwimi olusebenzela wena kakuhle kakhulu?

SourceText: Quick question for you! ü§î What are the benefits of play?
text: Umbuzo ongxamileyo kuwe! ü§î Yeyiphi imivuzo yokudlala?

SourceText: Absolutely! Play is fun ‚Äì and it also helps your child grow and supports both your mental health and your child‚Äôs.
text: Ngokuqinisekileyo! Ukudlala kuyonwabisa - kwaye kunceda umtwana wakho akhule kwaye kuxhasa impilo yengqondo yakho kunye neyomntana wakho.

SourceText: Want to learn more? Complete the full survey here: {IOGT link}
text: Ufuna ukufunda ngaphezulu? Gqibezela uphando olupheleleyo apha: {IOGT link}

SourceText: Yes! Play can boost your mood and reduce stress ‚Äì and it also encourages your child‚Äôs development in ways that are fun for you both.
text: Ewe! Ukudlala kuphucula imvakalelo yakho kwaye kwehlisa noxinzeleko - kwaye kukwakhuthaza uphuhliso lomntwana wakho kwiindlela ezonwabisayo kuni nobabini.

SourceText: That‚Äôs right! Play builds important life skills ‚Äì and it also supports emotional wellbeing for both you and your child in a fun way.
text: Ilungile lonto! Ukudlala kwakha izakhono zobomi ezibalulekileyo - kwaye kuxhasa impilo yeemvakalelo yakho kunye nomntwana wakho ngendlela eyonwabisayo.

SourceText: Exactly! Play is fun, it supports mental health, and it helps your child grow ‚Äì all at the same time. Everyone wins!
text: Ngokuchanekileyo! Ukudlala kuyonwabisa, kuxhasa impilo yengqondo, kwaye ikwanceda ukukhula komntwana wakho - kwangaxesha linye. Wonke umntu uyaphumelela!

SourceText: Message {PLAY} to get a simple, fun activity that you can do with your child. ü§∏üèæ
text: Bhala {PLAY} ukufumana umdlalo olula, owonwabisayo ongawenza kunye nomntwana wakho.ü§∏üèæ
